DarkMouse::

She listened in on the conversation. "Hey, Killfest.  I got something 
for you. Drillbit thinks he's going to be the leader. I thought you 
were going to be the leader.  Well, it looks like we got a stand off 
for leader."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream/Sharpedge:::
> 
> ::The realization dawned on him.  Diamond hadnt been seen since 
Kitkat's 
> death::
> Starscream: Oh my god...
> ::He than sees Drillbit going the other way.  He follows him to 
where 
> Darkmouse is and sees Drillbit's box.  he starts feeling terrible 
about 
> having a crush on Kitkat, when she and Drillbit were more in love 
than any 2 
> people he had ever seen in his life::
> Starscream: Wow.  She REALLY loved you.
> ::he than heres Drillbits announcement::
> Starscream: Well, if your the leader, im staying.
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge grinned from ear to ear as he heard this::
> Sharpedge: I understand you perfectly.  But why is Doom Ice one of 
your 
> targets?
